name: The Real ( Water Rafting )
description: The view of mountain agung and beautiful rice terrace make the telaga waja river best place to rafting . the source of water from spring water make the telaga waja river have to continue along the time and safe. Fast moving water made Telaga Waja River being category class IV river. you will challenge your adrenaline for 14km from start to finish and it will spend your time 2.5 hours.
